reviews.summary: My fianc and I booked our last night in Denver here, we were looking for a good deal and have stayed in at least 20 other hostels internationally so thought we'd give 11th Avenue a chance. We came up to the room that night after dinner and immediately thought everything looked dinghy

reviews.summary: The workout room is tiny with 2 treadmills and 2 cheap elliptical machines that rocked off the floor when in use. The attention to detail is impressive, from the thicker rimmed water glasses to the extra fluffy towels.

reviews.summary: It was conveniently located close to public transportation and made it easy for all of us to get there.  Good: The staff was very friendly and helpful when we asked for directions.

name: AC Hotel Miami Beach
reviews.summary: The property is beautifully appointed, with cool, industrial, minimalist decor and an unbeatable location in South Beach. They went out of their way to make sure that our stay was memorable (honeymoon, same-sex couple).

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Boston Downtown
reviews.summary: Good: Staff was very accommodating even those we shared elevator rides with. Location was central and easy to walk places.

Th price was cheap but the whole area doesn't look safe or proper for a family.

name: ARIA Resort Casino

reviews.summary: Why only 3 stars This hotel was obviously a factory or warehouse at one stage, so the concrete support column in the bedroom is a necessity. Didn't take me long to realize that the Ace has focused on aesthetics rather than service.

reviews.summary: Interesting quirky room (and very spacious compared to London and New York) with some great furniture and touches (like a guitar). If you've stayed at an Ace Hotel before, you'll know what to expect, and this new branch doesn't disappoint.

reviews.summary: From the moment i came here, Nita Perry were the most gracious couple ever, And while they need not accommodate my large truck, And trailer, With bikes in the back, They did with open arms :). I Love how this place feels like home, Not a Motel.

However, I guess this is part of the desging scheme but there were no drawers in my room (there are number of shelves you can put your stuff on) and the lighting in the room was pretty sparce.

reviews.summary: The huge lobby has a giant fireplace, a billiards table, and a full bar, where guests were hanging out and socializing. The only hassle was that they charged for the breakfast on a per-item basis, which was mediocre quality and expensive.

reviews.summary: The front desk did great when the shuttle got busy and provided us with a small token when the shuttle could not get to us for dinner.   I stay at this hotel frequently and always receive friendly service but this time my experience at the bar was exceptional.

categories: Hotel & Motel,  Real estate,  Hotel,  Lodging
reviews.summary: We booked through Travelocity and got a more than reasonable rate for airfare and lodging at Aloft.  Came out here to see my friends band play at the flats just across the street from Aloft!

name: Aloft Dallas Downtown
reviews.summary: Aloft in Downtown Dallas is affordable, and the decor is hip modern (and slightly cheesy, but refreshing and beautiful in contrast to the souless reds, beiges and florals of most chain hotels). Overall I'm fond of this place and wish Aloft would replace the Days and Holiday Inns of the world.

name: Aloft Denver Downtown
categories: Hotel Central Business District,  Lodging,  Hotel,  Hotel & Motel
reviews.summary: The room was clean, efficient, and allowed for green savings (5.00 coupon per day when maid service for towels and sheets weren't laundered We redeemed the daily coupons at the XYZ Bar in the lobby!). Loved the room layout which allowed for a long bench between desks for our double bed...

name: Aloft Detroit At The David Whitney
reviews.summary: Coffee in the lobby is complimentary and parking is either valet or... Our room had a terrific view of Comerica Park and Wooodward Avenue.

name: Aloft New Orleans Downtown
reviews.summary: We do in fact have a 72 hour cancellation policy that would have been clearly stated on the reservation when your travel agent booked so it certainly seems they would have informed you of that especially if you have a volatile schedule. The hotel is just out of the centre, about five minutes walk from Bourbon street and the French Quarter so very handy for the bars and restaurants, there are also a couple of supermarkets nearby.

name: Aloft New Orleans Downtown
reviews.summary: Our toiletries were shoved to a corner or moved over so they could place new toiletries, I had a half eaten sandwich placed on a shelf instead of being thrown away, the coffee pot wasn't put back or the coffee replenished (but new coffee cups were given), whatever was left on the bed was thrown back on it, there was a bottle cap left on the floor... small things that added up. The valet out from was super helpful when we were getting ready to leave by reserving us a taxi so we did not have to wait when we wanted one and put our items in the vehicle while we were checking out to make the process smooth and efficient.

name: Aloft Philadelphia Airport
reviews.summary: I loved how modern this hotel was and how it had everything we needed that I actually want to go to some of their other hotels in random states just to try them out too. Other than that it was a beautiful modern hotel with great amenities, clean rooms and a friendly sharply dressed staff.

reviews.summary: Of course you don't have to wait for his birthday to come back, we can help write a new Rx if needed: Phillies, Bell, Parkway, Casino, Shopping, Kimmel Center, Concerts, Theater, just to name a few :) Favorite part was the lobby, just a great place to hang out, nice bar, fun games, music at night, really cool area.

reviews.summary: Eeverywhere clean, comfortable large rooms, updated to modern day requirements of large FlatScreen TV's and fridges, although no coffee or tea making facilities in the room. The room was much cheaper than anything else available, and there was lots of parking- for free!

reviews.summary: a bag of bread, a toaster, doughnuts from the box store, and a jug of old orange juice is not going to get anyone through the morning. it is so close to Disneyland we were able to watch the fireworks from the room, and the night clerk was very helpful.

name: Americas Best Value Inn
reviews.summary: A good basic room at a good price and the management was very helpful. We had 5 rooms and all were clean and well maintained.

name: Americas Best Value Inn
categories: Travel and Tourism,  Lodging,  Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The room was clean, the beds very comfortable, and the property well maintained, but it was the friendly, warm-hearted proprietor who made this place special. I would recommend this motel as not only a good value but as a place with an unusually pleasant atmosphere.

name: Americas Best Value Inn
reviews.summary: Well...this was a much different experience than the red roof inn just 1 mile down the street. This place is OLD, VERY OLD...was a days Inn, and a Best Western prior to that!.

name: Americas Best Value Inn
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The heat wasn't working, so it was pretty cold, but it was obvious they were doing their best to fix it so we toughed it out the first night. They even lent me a wall charger for my phone for the night (and offered to let me keep it when I went to return it the next morning).

name: Americas Best Value Inn
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Although the employees were very nice and friendly, and the hotel was clean, I cannot give it more stars because the rooms were tiny and the beds were the most uncomfortable I have ever slept on. Stayed for 2 night with 2 dogs, really clean hotel for being pet friendly the staff was really friendly.

name: Americas Best Value Inn

reviews.summary: The bottom line: If this is a stop off on the way from point A to point B and you want to save some money for your vacation you might give it a try. If you are real particular about where you stay, then you might want to try another motel.

name: Americas Best Value Inn - Corpus Christi/Port Aransas
reviews.summary: The hotel is exactly what it needs to be for Port Aransas-- conveniently located (10 minutes walk from the beach), affordable (we booked a large room with a mini fridge, king size bed etc for 39 per night during the off season), and the owners are attentive, informative and incredibly friendly. There is also a lovely cafe across the street...

name: Americas Best Value Inn - Executive Suite Airport
reviews.summary: Room was huge, continental breakfast in the morning, good location close to airport, friendly staff - everything great, except the bed bugs. Unfortunately, that's a deal breaker - woke up with about 30 bites on hands, legs neck.

name: Americas Best Value Inn - Greeley/Evans
reviews.summary: Perhaps it was the dust storm created on a windy day by the unpaved lot next door that created a scene from the Grapes of Wrath as the Joads outran a duststorm that literally almost obliterated the hotel. Perhaps it was the bathroom, urine smell that greeted you as you entered the lobby the 1970s carpets,...

name: Americas Best Value Inn - Medical Center / Lubbock
reviews.summary: Room was very dirty, pillow cases stained, bathroom nasty, and outdated and we cancelled and decided not to stay at all! the first room we were given ...the key didnt work and so the front desk reassigned us another room.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Albert Lea
reviews.summary: IT started with a walk all the way around the Hotel to the back by the bowling alley. Our normal hotels were booked and our only choice was Americas Best Value Inn.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Batesville
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Apartment Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The only issues I have was the shower curtain had a little mold on the bottom and the toliet was not cleaned properly. This property is quiet, all one level with drive-up parking and, although older, it's pretty well-maintained.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Bighorn Lodge
reviews.summary: Easy access in and out of town before driving through Rocky Mountain park. This was a good last minute place to stay with a convenient location.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Clear Lake
reviews.summary: Instead of being polite and understanding, the desk person asked why I had not brought this to their attention last night and told me I could not switch rooms. She finally offered to let us switch rooms after looking at the room herself....

name: Americas Best Value Inn Grand Junction
reviews.summary: Very clean, staff was pleasant and rooms setup with desk, wifi, mini-fridge and microwave. It's a cheap and easy alternative when the Hilton and Marriot are booked.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Grand Junction
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: More This is quite an old motel, with outside stairs and doors.....not my favorite style of hotel, but, since we're just passing through, we decided to give it a go. The room was fine as a whole, and the place seemed to be somewhat newly renovated, however there was nothing here to brag about in terms of you must stay here.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Green River

reviews.summary: We were traveling from Pennsylvania to Las Vegas, Nevada to our new home, and one night we were exhausted and happened to find ourselves in Green River, Utah. We saw the family-owned Americas Best Value Inn and prayed that the establishment was pet friendly.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Jonesville
reviews.summary: This is a very, very basic motel, but it did have microwave and fridge, was clean and our room with a king bed was spacious for a motel and had a little table and two chairs. So I gave this a bad review a couple of years ago but the recent reviews made me want to try it again.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Las Vegas
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: To be short: no wifi (it works only at front desk and pool, lol), no refrigerator, very old TV with bad reception, with non working remote. Very small room, actually too small for 2 beds, very old repainted furniture.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Louisville
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Greetings , Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate that you give us oppertunity to serve us everytime you come to visit louisville. I go to Louisville about every four to six weeks for some personal business and visit with family.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Mackinaw City
reviews.summary: The gentleman at the front desk phoned after my wife and I were in the room for a few minutes to make certain we had no problems and were happy with the room. It was heart shaped and they way it was set up, we could each sit comfortably next to each other and watch television.

name: Americas Best Value Inn Macon

reviews.summary: There are signs that encourage customers to lock and chain their doors but there were no chains in the two rooms we were in. If you are doing sightseeing in Macon, the hotel is only about 10 min away from downtown.

name: Americas Best Value Inn New Philadelphia
reviews.summary: The sweeper hadnt been ran in our room when we got there. We had to turn AC down to 63 to get it cool in our room.

reviews.summary: More  When we arrived, we thought that the pool would suffice as our main form of entertainment, but since the pool was packed beyond belief, we were forced to find other forms of entertainment. I found the tiny arcade, and I got very lucky winning a ton of tickets and getting a ton of prizes, but the tokens are still very...

name: Blue Haven Motor Court
reviews.summary: The room smelled like a motel, but was very clean and a fantastic price for the full cabin with 4 beds and a full kitchen. Very last minute reservation as we finished dinner and started searching for a bed near Kennebunkport.

name: Blue Jay Motel
reviews.summary: I had very low expectations about staying in a motel and was blown away by the hospitality and the cleanliness. Staying here was like staying with your favorite out of town relatives.

name: Blue Mountain Inn Suites
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We only stayed one night but were pleased that the room was clean and quite. If you're ever in the neighborhood again, we hope we'll see you!

name: Blue Sands Motel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Lodging,  Motel East Beach,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Not only did they welcome our two standard poodles with open arms, but they were flexible with our late arrival and did everything possible to make our stay amazing. Greeted so kindly, we chose them for price we were surprised at how nice for the money.

name: Blue Sky Lodge
reviews.summary: It's hard to say what needs to be done - it was fine for us people who still remember 60s but our children were a little bit disappointed that kitchen and other amenities were not updated. On the other hand if it exists for 60 years people must find it attractive and I wish the owner(s) good luck with this place for the next 60 years.

name: Bluegreen Parkside Williamsburg, Ascend Resort Collection
reviews.summary: Good: It was big enough for our family. We could all relax and enjoy ourselves.

name: Bluegreen Vacations Patrick Henry Sqr, Ascend Resort Collection
reviews.summary: Good: I loved the room it was spacious and beautiful, with hardwood floors and all the necessities needed to be able to cook if you wanted, the rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable, I would definitely stay here again   Bad: To be honest there wasn't anything I did not like which is rare specially with two kids.

name: Bluewater Inn And Suites
reviews.summary: We have stayed in the kitchen rooms and those have everything you need.... The owners and staff are very friendly and make you feel welcome.

name: Bluewater Resort Casino
categories: Casino,  Hotel & Motel,  Resorts,  Resort,   Hotel,  Restaurants,   and Resort,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The Blue Water Casino/Resort is not 2 1/2 hours from Phoenix...way easier then heading to CA...and way less expensive. The front desk lady was very nice and accommodating, but we were early and had to wait for our room...our fault.

name: Bluffside Motel
reviews.summary: The owner Kurt was very friendly and it was nice to be able to sit outside my room and chill out after a ride up from New Berlin on my rented Harley. This was my first ever night in a motel in the US and I was not disappointed.

name: Bogue Inlet Motel
reviews.summary: More  Not so bad if your there just to fish, good enough to lay your head,after a long day nite of fishing, I will stay there again! Real close to the pier, Don't have to drive any where, The pier has all you need!!

name: Boon Hotel & Spa
reviews.summary: In the shadow of the redwoods and in front of a crackling fire, its hard to be dissatisfied: Boon is the antithesis of stress. Dogs are not only allowed but welcomed so long as they remain as chilled out as their human companions.

name: Bougainvillea On The Beach
reviews.summary: Beautiful, tropical courtyard right outside our door to hang out at night. Every year we stay somewhere different because we haven't found THE ONE.

name: Boulder Creek Lodge Montana
reviews.summary: Bathroom and shower were immaculate even with a full complement of visitors. Would have stayed longer if I didn't have to go to work.

reviews.summary: AC worked great, and great circulation if you would rather have the windows open. They need to install better filtration or something.

reviews.summary: We can't remember how many times we have stayed at Brewster By The Sea over the years. They are wonderful hosts and make every effort to ensure we have a perfect visit.

reviews.summary: They have free (included in your room price) wine and cheese in the evening, free breakfast and at 9:00pm there... Peter at front of house is a wonderful representative who could do equally as well in a top London Hotel.

name: Columbus Motor Inn
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: It was easy, and after signing up to Grubhub online (with the WiFi being included in the room price) and selecting a place, we called down to let reception know we had a delivery coming and he said they would bring it right up to the room for us - something we're not used to in UK hotels, but very convenient for 2 weary travellers!We were able to eat properly too, as the room has a small dining table and chairs next to the window. One added bonus with the Columbus Inn was the small balcony we had in our room - enough to step out on and watch the world go by and with surprising good views of Coit Tower and even a glimpse of the Golden Gate across the rooftops, so I was a happy bunny!We were getting to the end of our stamina on this 4000 odd mile trip, and so opted to order take out to be delivered to the hotel for dinner.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Auburn/Opelika

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chesterton

reviews.summary: I paid an average of 100/king for three nights on a holiday weekend which isn't bad for an HGI in this area. I chose this hotel because I'm loyal to Hilton and have status, plus it was an ideal location for my needs.

reviews.summary: Only complaint was a fire alarm test that wasn't communicated and evacuation wasn't needed at 8:00 am which was an inconvience but nothing more. This is a very good hotel to stay if you are visiting Fresno or Clovis, specially by business.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Colorado Springs Airport
reviews.summary: It has a lovely warm fireplace, delicious dinner and they even started breakfast five minutes early since I had to leave early for the day.  The hotel rooms are nice, clean, and updated and are equipped with a refrigerator and microwave.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus Dublin
reviews.summary: The staff was excellent and did a great job recommending different resteraunts and other things to do while we waited for our hockey game. We set up a room for our guests during a wedding and everyone had such fabulous things to say- definitely recommend this hotel!

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus/Grove City
reviews.summary: I would definitely recommend this hotel because it's clean the staff is very pleasant and the breakfast is great. Wifi is lacking, my phone worked better on its own data vs. the hotel Internet.

name: Hilton Garden Inn DallasMarket Center
reviews.summary: First room they gave us on the third floor reeked of smoke (despite not being a smoking room), so we called to inquire abotu switching rooms and without asking they upgraded us to a deluxe room which had a larger bed and a couch, which was very nice. Dear Valued Guest:I want to thank you for your comments and feedback as this allows us to improve our products and servcies for you and all future guests of ours.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Edison/Raritan Center
reviews.summary: We had the buffet and it was very good - you can order custom omelets and they had biscuits, sausage gravy, bacon, sausage, grits and eggs all hot and ready. There is breakfast served next to the lobby area in the morning - there is a continental breakfast (6.95) or a breakfast buffet (9.95).

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fayetteville
reviews.summary: I would happily stay here again next time that I am in Fayetteville. The only drawback is there is no free breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fayetteville
reviews.summary: The hotel was well decorated, the room was very clean and the staff was courteous and helpful. I didnt have time to try the breakfast but I hear it's fabulous!

name: Hilton Garden Inn Grand Rapids East

reviews.summary: The only slight niggle was the breakfast which ran out of things quickly and not replaced - but that said the most delicious apple filled pancakes!!!!MoreHi karenst0ne, Thank you for sharing your review of your experience with us at Hyatt Centric Waikiki Beach. We stayed in a corner suite room that was spacious and well appointed with a separate living area and large bedroom that also had a really nice bathroom with shower and bath.

reviews.summary: The room was nice, the bed and pillows were comfy, nice desk area for nightly paperwork, the toothpaste they provided came in handy since I ran out and the food and beverage was a nice treat!   If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

name: Hyatt House Parsippany/Whippany

name: Hyatt House Seattle/Downtown

We didn't really utilize the kitchen because we ate the complimentary hotel breakfast which kept us full until we ate out for an early dinner everyday, but it is a great feature it had a microwave, stove, dishwasher, and a majority of the dishes, utensils, and pans you would need.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
reviews.summary: This hotel oozes luxury and very family friendly, my family of 4 was really looked after, Two small gripes, the hotel should have somewhere in the evening where a family can enjoy drinks and desserts, that is not the bar, very often we could not get a space there in the evening or felt uncomfortable to be there with kids, the other point being in room dining could be improved, the menu was a bit short for us and the kitchen was not flexible enough to tailor some dishes, for example making the pasta spicy, we ordered some rice with our chicken and it was just undercooked , it was changed immediately and we were given complimentary glasses of wine but it was too late when one is starving ! Concierge services was very helpful, a big shout out to Carlos who was the most helpful concierge guy we had come across for a while, he is a mine of information about the local area.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
reviews.summary: After we explained the reception staff-courteous, proper and friendly as ever- that we are olde regular costumers in need to check in that day, they were helpfully at getting us one of their very best Rooms, within quality reserved, Room 1815 located on 18 th floor with the most splendid views to Biscayne Bay and those beautiful Southwestern water Seas, great by day, but even greater by Miami multicolored lights night That views are just part, as well, of the myriad of details that makes The Mandarin...a paradise found ! In can, professionally and humanly, asserts that the Mandarin Oriental, in Brickell Key, has what a great hotel needs certain style in its attractive design elegance and distinction, warmth and intimacy in the architecture and its deco design and architectural layout, which is not boxed into standards, offering a different theme in hospitality, from entranced areas to guest-rooms to facilities...making every single stay in it a unique experience !

name: Motel 6 Atlanta Northwest - Marietta
reviews.summary: I came to Georgia in November the people at motel 6 that made feel welcome, Ms. Randall, Ms. Brianna, Ms. Sheena and Ms. Queen and Mr. Ferrando have been really great, they make you feel glad to be here. After a long day on the road all you need is great customer service.

name: Motel 6 Atlanta Tucker Northeast
reviews.summary: Bathroom could use work as hot and cold water is reversed and hot water doesn't get very hot. Needed a cheap place near Atl for the weekend.

name: Motel 6 Bakersfield Airport
reviews.summary: Most of all were greeted at the front lobby counter by Ryan she is such a kind helpful person who makes every guest feel welcome and important. Great amenities, such as coffee of a few different types as well as hot chocolate in the morning.

name: Motel 6 Big Bear
reviews.summary: The motel had easy access to both Highways, was quite, comfortable, allowed pets for no additional charge, and was a great price to stay. The room was small, but was packed with amenities and had enough room for me to pop up a dog kennel inside.

name: Motel 6 Cave City Ky
reviews.summary: Hotel seems a bit run down but the proximity to attractions and restaurants was convenient. My husband and I cleaned the room, as it was not quite clean as we wanted it to be.

name: Motel 6 Denver Central - Federal Boulevard
reviews.summary: I talked with the person working the desk and she let me check in early (12 noon instead of 3pm) and I thought I was off to a good start,... I needed a no frills place to sleep during the day and wifi internet while I was working in Denver overnight.

name: Motel 6 Ellensburg
reviews.summary: It's unfortunate that we only spent a few hours in our room as we got in really late and had to leave really early. They let us check in early and gave us directions to where we were...

name: Motel 6 Euless DFW West
reviews.summary: This is a very clean place BUT it is a bed and TV and a bathroom/Shower. I watched this place being renovated twice in 14 years.

name: Motel 6 Globe
reviews.summary: We have stayed in so many other motel 6's but this one caught my eyes and I decided to write a review on it. I had specifically requested a room with a refrigerator as I had to keep medication refrigerated.

name: Motel 6 Grand Rapids - Airport
reviews.summary: Online, when I booked through a company, it said that breakfast was included. It is not included anymore, that was a bummer.

name: Motel 6 Jaiden & Jiya LLC
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel,  Lodging
reviews.summary: When we arrived, around 8:00 pm, after being on the road all day we expected at least a decent room to crash for the night. Little did I know, I ran into construction on the off-ramp and the intersection just before the hotel.

name: Motel 6 Lafayette - University Ave
reviews.summary: We obtained our room and what a shock.....the person next door left the TV on loud for her pets. We identified this one and when we arrived the lobby was empty....very little furnishings....

name: Motel 6 Lake Charles, LA
reviews.summary: The room, although clean, spacious and relatively bug free, (saw several roaches) was not well lit, had cracks and scratches in the walls, and was noisy. We complained about the lighting several times, and also our neighbor's squeaky door without results.

name: Motel 6 Lawrence Ks
reviews.summary: Once my associate got to the hotel the clerk then asked me to verify the credit card that I'd given Trip Advisor. Air conditioner did not work but the friendly staff moved us to another room immediately.

name: Motel 6 Mason
reviews.summary: I was there for the tennis tournament, so just needed a safe place to stay and it worked. The room on the ground floor smelled smoke even though it was a non smoking room.

name: Motel 6 Naperville
reviews.summary: 5 mins from the Naperville Train station which makes commuting to Chicago downtown easier. Recommend to all my friends who visits Naperville Chicago area.

name: Motel 6 Norfolk
reviews.summary: This little motel has the attraction of a difficult entrance depending on the direction you're coming from and some very unprofessional employee's, though they did allow smoking in the rooms which was a plus, I woke up the next morning to my car having signs of an attempt of being broken into. Some kinda shortage of housekeepers and waited two hours on checking into a reserved room.

name: Motel 6 Oakland Airport
reviews.summary: MoreEd, We are sorry that you were unsatisfied with the expected amenities however, Motel 6 standards for quality are rooted in economical practicalities to consistently deliver on our goal to provide the lowest price of any national chain. The only benefit is a a gas station next door and a casino a block away.

name: Motel 6 Redmond
reviews.summary: Close to airport, clean, spartan, nice people, no negative experiences. Was only at hotel for 11 hours but would stay there again if needed.

name: Motel 6 Ridgecrest
reviews.summary: While I understand there was an infestation in Ridgecrest, I would think the cleaning staff would be sure to vacuum at least the dead ones and attempt to get rid of the live ones.  You can't expect much for 50, however our room was clean, although the furnishing are well worn.

name: Motel 6 Salinas South - Monterey Area
reviews.summary: On my way to the room there were several residents sunning themselves on the... More I provided several and was told that they needed one with my address on them.

name: Motel 6 San Bernardino North
reviews.summary: Numerous signs warning that they are not responsible for your vehicle or its contents even though there is a security guard around. More  Management favors drug dealers, prostitutes and lots of short-term visitors to their rooms at all hours.

name: Motel 6 San Jose - Campbell
reviews.summary: Somewhat bare bones, but it had one queen bed, very comfortable, TV, small table and chairs, luggage rack, nice tub and shower, really, a great bargain! No fridge or microwave, but there was free coffee in the office.

name: Motel 6 Santa Barbara - Carpinteria North
reviews.summary: This place is ok for a night or two, if you can live the excess noise coming from the freeway, then three nights is just about doable I stayed here for three nights while I explored nearby Santa Barbara.

name: Motel 6 Santa Fe - Cerrillos Road South
reviews.summary: on may26,2016 I pulled into parking lot with a flat tire I rented a room for 2 days one day cost 46.11 the 2nd day was57.11 the manger called the police and had me removed for trying too change my tire.  You have to be prepared for anything at a hotel within this price range, but I was surprised to find that it was clean and decently maintained.

name: Motel 6 Santa Maria
reviews.summary: I went a couple times when I was a kid and all I remember from those trips is smokey-smelling , musty rooms, with broken and/or outdated furniture and beds I didn't want to put my suitcase on, let alone sleep in. In the past, Motel 6 has not been on my hotel radar.

name: Motel 6 Scottsdale
categories: Hotel Fashion Square,  Lodging,  Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: But it's a Motel 6 right in the heart of Scottsdale, next to the mall, breakfast places, bars, restaurants and clubs with an easy walk anywhere on Scottsdale Road all the way to the ballpark. You will get what Tom Bodett says, A... More

name: Motel 6 Silver City
reviews.summary: If you are looking for upscale lodging this is not the place but if you want a clean comfortable room to use a base to explore the area this... Not the newest in town but very clean and friendly staff.

name: Motel 6 Texarkana TX
reviews.summary: although the motel6 liess than a mile away is cheaper, not sure why, but overall the motel is good place to stay.  good location, is clean, seems safer, no people hanging around the parking lot anymore.

name: Motel 6 Tucson North
reviews.summary: Was it something other than Motel 6 in the past Reception very helpful. Interior hallways which is a bit unusual for this chain.

name: Motel 6 Tupelo
reviews.summary: Please know the conditions you describe are an exception to our guest commitment and as such, we apologize for the...More We are committed to delivering a clean, comfortable room and apologize for any failure during your recent stay.

name: Motel 6 Ventura South
reviews.summary: If you are on vacation, it's not luxury, but if you are looking for a safe, clean place to sleep, it's fine. Easy parking, some freeway noise but windows do not open so AC drowned it out.

name: Motel 6 Watsonville - Monterey Area
reviews.summary: Smoke rolls out of the rooms like a scene from an old Cheech and Chong movie. People staying here must think no smoking only applies to cigarettes.

name: Motel 6 Willows
reviews.summary: Don't confuse this location with the extended stay location which you can see at the freeway offramp. The rooms are updated and modern, although I think the bright orange wall will get old quickly.

name: Motel 6 York North
reviews.summary: I don't have the heart to complain about all the amenities this place dose not have so I'll say instead that this property has had yet another refurbishing and a very good one. Sleep, shower and get out !

name: Motel 6-albert Lea
reviews.summary: There is no tissue (Kleenex) and don't expect complimentary shampoo and conditioner. This was in a quiet location and there was no noise heard from adjoining rooms.

name: Motel 6-dubuque
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: My sisters and I had a total of 4 rooms all filthy and... More The toilet handle broke the safety door lock was broke.

name: Motel 6-opelika
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel,  Travel & Lodging
reviews.summary: The staff is always courteous and they will assist you as much as they possibly can (i.e., early check-in, directions, extra towels and wash clothes, etc.) This has been one of the most accomadating hotels I have ever visited.

name: Motel 6-perry
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: I have been reluctant to try Motel 6, but after reading the reviews on this one in Perry, and being desperate, I booked a room. There's a place to walk the dogs where people seemed to be picking up after their dogs (yay!).

name: Motel 6-york North
reviews.summary: No U tums on route 30, therefore not the easiest to get to. No clock or shampoo but for the price we had a nice stay.

name: Motel Del Rogue
reviews.summary: Peaceful, comfortable and the owners are super nice people, very friendly and accommodating. Friendly staff and informative about area, but can't make up for lack of care at motel.

name: Motel Durango
reviews.summary: I just needed one night's rest and didn't want to pay 150 at the nicer places but this room wasn't worth it. Paper thin walls, dirty, curtain had holes and shredded edges, no hair dryer, no kleenex.

name: Motel Etna
reviews.summary: The small staff were very accommodating to our needs and made our stay very pleasant. This is a small motel with 9 or 10 rooms.

name: Motel Mediteran
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We drove up to the motel and had second thoughts about this reservation. When we opened the door to our room, our fears were allayed.

name: Motel West Bend
reviews.summary: I took a last minute trip to Bend to visit Deschutes Brewery, and was looking for a last minute stay that was walking distance from downtown at a reasonable price. The Motel is 1/3 of the price of the downtown hotels such as Hilton, Marriott ect.

name: Mountain View Hotel
reviews.summary: We arrived a bit early to town for a wedding and stopped at the hotel just to see if by chance we could get an early check-in. They were so accommodating to our party and checked us in almost two hours earlier which helped us out tremendously!

name: Mountain View Inn
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Corporate Lodging,  Hotel,  Lodging
reviews.summary: Had to use ironing board couldn't get it to close. Big refrigerator, microwave, small coffee maker.

name: Mountain View Inn
categories: Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Corporate Lodging,  Lodging
reviews.summary: Had to use ironing board couldn't get it to close. Big refrigerator, microwave, small coffee maker.

name: Mountain View Motel Campground
reviews.summary: We were impressed with the interior rustic woodwork, granite top vanity and wood floors. They included a flat screen HD TV, mini fridge and tiled bathroom.

name: Mountainside Inn
reviews.summary: The Mountainside Inn may be a bit dated, but it is affordable, clean, large bathrooms, excellent apres-ski hot tub, and only minutes on foot from lift 7. The walk to downtown is 15 minutes, and Clark's Market is about 6 minutes.

name: Mountvernon Motel
reviews.summary: There is also a small coffee and tea shop on the grounds, called the Java Hut. I've stayed here twice while in the Mount Vernon area.

name: Moxy Chicago Downtown
categories: Bar and grill restaurants,  Restaurants,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: I would recommend this place for 2 Millennial besties (at least one needs to be a proud owner of a fedora), it's in a good spot, it's a party scene, and people in their 20s don't have the same expectations as the rest of us. Since the poker chip they give you immediately is cashed in for a rum concoction before you even get the chance to say anything I wouldn't recommend this place for those striving to be sober.

name: Moxy Chicago Downtown
reviews.summary: Traveler beware if your are on business (especially a women) this is most likely not the place for you - unless you just want tacos and the free lollypop from room service. I get the revenue play with putting more rooms in a much small piece of real estate but for the nightly cost, a business traveler can find much nicer hotels in Chicago.

name: Mt Vernon Motel
reviews.summary: We'd made our reservation a week ahead, but when we arrived, we had to wait for someone to return from unexpected business to the office. When we inquired about AARP or other discounts, we were told No, we don't do that.

name: Mt Washington Conference Center
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Caterers,  Conference centers and team building facilities,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Rooms come with a extensive continental breakfast, and use of well-equipped fitness center in McAuley Hall, accessible by indoor corridor. The grounds are extensive with a variety of lovely trees and plants.

name: My Place Hotel-Billings, MT
reviews.summary: Allows pets and had sufficient walking area. Stayed overnight on our way to Yellostone.

name: My Place Hotel-Brookings, SD
reviews.summary: The beds were super comfy and the room came with a full sized fridge and full kitchen, which was a very nice addition. It's a new hotel, right in front of the convention center for anyone who is looking near there!

name: My Place Hotel-Grand Forks, ND
reviews.summary: Great place to stay.. Clean comfortable friendly great bed.. Stayed two nights slept great... Full size fridge was handy for the fruits and veggies bought at Sam's club.

name: My Place Hotel-dickinson Nd
reviews.summary: They are the only extended stay hotel that I have stayed in that doesn't provide any type of cookware or utensils of any kind. Unless you plan to bring dishes and all cooking utensils with you don't plan on cooking anything.

name: My Place Hotel-pasco Wa
reviews.summary: PRO: Clean, comfy bed, table with chairs, refrigerator, great wifi, lots of vending options CON: Thin walls - able to hear other guests, no silverware We arrived late at night after a harrowing trip over Snoqualmie Pass - so happy to be greeted with a clean place to sleep.

name: My Place Hotel-rock Springs, Wy
reviews.summary: The kitchen was unusual, but nice to have the counter space the 'huge for a motel' frig - loved having the freezer space large enough to refreeze all my ices from my cooler!! What seemed strange was there was not one single kitchen utensil of any kind in the drawers or cupboard.

name: My Place Hotel-south Omaha/la Vista Ne
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel consultants,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We will definitely be staying here again and have recommended it to several people! This was our third stay at My Place and once again we were very pleased.

name: My Place Suites
reviews.summary: We travel to Tucson from Las Vegas at least once a year and love to stopover in Wickenburg. The suites have a kitchen with a stove, oven, full refrigerator and...

name: NOPSI Hotel New Orleans
reviews.summary: The 3 egg omelet Pontchartrain, Porchetta Hash and Eggs, Pecan Belgian Waffles and 1/2 Ruby Grapefruit Brle were the best room service meals I believe my husband and I have ever had for breakfast. So both my friend and I showered without washing our hair, only to have housekeeping show up again at 2AM IN THE MORNING, banging on the door, with one bottle of shampoo that I guess they found.

name: NYLO Plano at Legacy
categories: Business Hotel,  Cocktail Bar,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Lounge,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: NYLO is tucked quietly away within a short distance from the shops at legacy and tons of restaurants. Second, the lady that did breakfast service every morning was very sweet and always treated us well.

name: NYLO Plano at Legacy
categories: Business Hotel,  Cocktail Bar,  Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Lounge,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: NYLO is tucked quietly away within a short distance from the shops at legacy and tons of restaurants.  Normally we don't stay places for NYE, but this year we wanted to do something a little different.

name: Naples Courtyard Inn
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Corporate Lodging,  Travel Agencies,  Hotel
reviews.summary: This small hotel had the friendliest staff, great location, nice clean rooms, and a great continental breakfast poolside under the cabanas with a wonderful wait staff! They attended to any needs of those who stayed there.

name: National 9 Inn
reviews.summary: The National 9 Inn is under new management, and the new proprietor/manager was most helpful...even helped us find local gas prices and locations online. After a long day from tourist-priced Colorado, we stopped for a room in Garden City.

name: National 9 Inn-sand Canyon
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Motel,  Bed & Breakfast & Inns,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Dirty floors, minimal cable TV, no amenities other than free WiFi (worked fine) and free parking. Everything has been used well (which is not a positive statement).

name: National Trail Motel
reviews.summary: Twin beds were right inside the door and there was an oversized chest of drawers and a bureau. It is your great-grandfather's motor inn or motor court before the word motel was coined.

name: Nauvoo Grand Bed Breakfast
categories: Bed and Breakfast and Inns,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The rooms were nicely decorated and clean, although the bathroom was a bit cramped in our 2nd floor room. Very impressed with the period correct sitting areas that greet you as you enter the home.

name: Neal's Court
reviews.summary: Very affordable for clean rooms, good service and locations. Manager helpful with questions about what to do in the area.

name: Neptune Hollywood Beach Hotel
categories: Hotel-Apartment,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Resorts,  Motel,  Hotel,  Apartments
reviews.summary: Has a excellent service and good hygiene, the staff are friendly and efficient working always in a good team Yolanda, Mirna Viktor. More  As soon as i arrived Yolanda took great care of me actually the best customer service iv ever had at any hotel.

name: Neu Lodge Motel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We had reservations elsewhere for a week, but do to a scheduling conflict with that establishment, they put us all up at the Neu Lodge Motel. Owners/operators of the motel went above and beyond to accomadate our large group, even helping us prepare food for everyone.

name: New Orleans Inn
reviews.summary: Needless to say, this wouldn't be my go-to hotel, but now that I've stayed at it, I would definitely consider it as a backup hotel and if I were solo again. I had a non-smoking room and I couldn't smell any major lingering smoke smell from any past use which is better than some other budget hotels.

name: New Victorian Inn Suites Sioux City
reviews.summary: The breakfast was delicious the have biscuits and gravy and you average danishes waffle maker boiled eggs cereals orange juice apple juice... the location is very clean and convenient right off the expressway there is a culver's restaurant,walmart, and sam's club across the street.

name: New Victorian Inn Suites Sioux City
reviews.summary: This hotel was EXCELLENT - from the entry with the fresh water/cookies to the restful stay / comfortable beds / to the wonderful breakfast - just a great stay and I highly recommend this hotel! The free breakfast was nothing special but the pool and spa are open 24 hours.

name: Newark Garden Hotel
categories: Lodging,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel Consultants,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The bed was quite comfortable, the room was clean and spacious, full hot breakfast was included, and there was a good sized conference/dining room at the hotel... It had the nostalgic allure of an older hotel, and immediately the hotel's simple charm and genuinely friendly staff won me over.

name: Newark Garden Hotel
categories: Motel,  Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel Consultants,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The bed was quite comfortable, the room was clean and spacious, full hot breakfast was included, and there was a good sized conference/dining room at the hotel... More  Recently my family experienced a tragedy that brought us all together in Newark, many of us stayed at the Newark Garden Hotel.

name: Nine Pines Motel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Resorts,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: I picked this place bc of its proximity to a concert I was attending. Pinetop is probably not where you are going to find it.

name: Nites Inn
categories: Lodging,  Bed and Breakfast and Inns,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Not only that, but there are a lot of cockroaches, semi-torn carpet, and the walls have black fingerprints that look like they have been there... The room I stayed in was not that clean when I first checked in.

name: Nob Hill Hotel
categories: Business Hotel,  Health Clubs Gyms,  Hotel & Motel,  Travel,  Budget Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel,  Family-Friendly Hotel
reviews.summary: Out first room, on the fourth floor, although a double, was a disappointment very small and cramped, no draw space, tiny shower room, single glazing, overlooking the main street, very noisy (there is an Emergency Hospital directly opposite with vehicles coming in though-out the night).Our second room (floor two) was much larger, with ample cupboard/draw space and a bath and was situated at the rear of the building clean, but, again a little tired. Our building and some of our furniture are quite old, but we trust that you noticed the wonderful standard of cleanliness and upkeep that we maintain, and we hope that this did not detract from your stay too much.

name: Nobu Hotel at Caesars Palace
reviews.summary: The hotel is in the center of Caesars and convenient for walking throughout the propertype. Rooms are a bit smaller than the Augustus Tower where we usually stay.

name: Nordic Lodge
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Resorts,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The staff was very friendly, bed was very comfortable and we loved the private patio off our room and also the large deck off the pool area. They always have water, coffee and tea available in the lobby as well as microwave popcorn and Famous...

name: Norfolk Country Inn & Suites
reviews.summary: there were some kids playing with fire bombs the first coupe nights and there were some smokers right above us that kept throwing their butts over the railing and one night there was a car in the handicapped place right outside our door. There were a couple parts of the room that weren't the cleanest and the exhaust fan in the bathroom didn't work.

name: North Port Motel
reviews.summary: I gave it 4 stars because our room was clean and comfortable and the motel well met our limited needs. I agree with most of the comments from the other reviewer (MKEcritic).

name: North Star Lodge
reviews.summary: More  Arriving here late at night I didn't really appreciate the beautiful surroundings until I woke up the next day, and the hotel itself was not too bad either. We stayed at the North Star Lodge over the Martin Luther King weekend and were pleasantly surprised by the condition of the property.

name: Northern Rail Traincar Inn
categories: Lodging,  Bed and Breakfast and Inns,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Our only complaint is that we wish they would stick with the train theme throughout rather than having the train building and lobby with various themes for the rooms themselves. We just recently booked a 2 night stay and are most definitely taken with the hospitality and amenities...

name: Northgate Motel
categories: Travel and Tourism,  Motel,  Hotel,  Lodging
reviews.summary: The owner is a nice guy and we had a great talk with him about some families from Conrad. We staid only for one night and this probably was the best option in town.

name: Northwoods Resort
categories: Lodging,  Motel,  Resorts,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We had to leave the bedroom door open and leave the gas fireplace on to heat the bedroom, but it still was a little cool. I will come back for special occasions in the future.

name: Norwalk Inn & Conference Center
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Bed Breakfast,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: It has prime location among many other places in town , Friendly staff with happy smile to help with all your need , giving ride to anywhere in town . There was a great restaurant where we had a wonderful family meal.

name: Oak Island Inn
reviews.summary: The price was reasonable for summer season and being two blocks from the public entrance to the beach. I have not been to Oak Island before but will be back mostly thanks to the owners here.

name: Oak Tree Inn
reviews.summary: Dirty, old soap on floor of shower, real thin 2 towels, only 1/2roll TP, bed real soft lumpy, no water glass, smelled moldy, the AC Was so noisy whenever it decided to cycle would wake up Rip VanWinkle. I looked for Cheep and I got it.

name: Oak Tree Inn
reviews.summary: Rooms were very clean, nice size with very comfortable bed and furnishing including a microwave and fridge. Brunswick is a Railroad town and many of the railroad engineers stay at the hotel Check in is a the Diner.

name: Oak Tree Inn
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Motel,  Budget Hotel,  Lodges,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel,  Family-Friendly Hotel
reviews.summary: Anyways got a rate for 45.99 after i found out that was what others staying there were paying. Asked them to put a piece of mail in their outgoing, sat...

name: Oak Tree Inn Irvine
reviews.summary: There are few motels in the area unless you want to stay in Richmond so I stayed here. There was no comfortable chair provided in the room.

name: Ocean Beach Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The balcony we had was great and had an awesome view of the ocean, the beach, the end of Newport...the whole scene. Parking, while a bit tight, is right on site - a welcome feature in OB.

name: Ocean Breeze Lodge
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Resorts,  Lodging,  Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The rooms are very clean, the beds are really comfortable, and the lodge is very convenient to the downtown Fort Bragg area. The hospitality shown by Linda added to the quality of the stay.

name: Ocean Breeze Motel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Motel,  Bed & Breakfast & Inns,  Hotel
reviews.summary: For a super affordable price you will get an impeccably clean room, gracious and friendly check-in and assistance, and old-time amenities that include a fire pit, picnic tables and horseshoe pits! It's located right on the 101, so while very convenient, the road noise is pretty loud in the room (especially if you keep your window open - no... More

name: Ocean Drive Villas
reviews.summary: My husband and I stayed at Ocean Drive Villas for a few nights to celebrate our anniversary and we were VERY pleased! We walked from our room to the beach in 2 minutes and the boardwalk had plenty to offer for food and activities!...

name: Ocean House Hotel
reviews.summary: Noise travels in the building, but luckily the median age of the guests is somewhere north of 60, so the place settles down at a reasonable hour. We only stayed 2 days and could have stayed longer, The host and hostess are real nice.

name: Ocean Park Hotel
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Travel and Tourism,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We couldn't even enjoy being intimate cause they squeaked so much loudy. It felt like i was in solitary confinment cause the room was so plain.

name: Ocean Park Inn
reviews.summary: We were there for Pacific Beach's annual Holiday Parade (there were also Santa Run marathons) and we wanted a hotel that we could easily walk to and from the Parade Route that took place on Garnet Ave. Once you pull the mirror door open, you'll find two of the most luxurious, double-layer terry cloth bath robes hanging for you (These robes are so comfy that we bought some to take home!!!

name: Ocean Sands Resort
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Resorts,  Resort,  Timeshare Companies,  Hotel
reviews.summary: I could only imagine what it's like in the summer, but for a quiet winter-retreat it's a fantastic place to get-a-way for a... More Only thing nice about the property was the friendly staff, room layout and decent location.  I am quite pleased with the level of service with this resort, Upon arrival we walked into the lobby and it was very warm and inviting.

name: Ocean Shores Motel
reviews.summary: Checked in first and then saw the room: clean but small, depressing and on a hot weekend it was not air conditioned. Stayed up half the night worried about someone reaching in(no screens either).

name: Ocean Suites
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: When the sun came out I noticed flower baskets hanging under the staircase on the main building and some trumpet vine, and fuchsias blooming on the hillside. The mini kitchen has a full size refrigerator, microwave, oven, coffee maker with coffee provided.

name: Ocean View Terrace Motel
reviews.summary: We should have thought about booking accommodations for the night earlier, but were lucky to find Ocean View Terrace. When our flight out of LGA was delayed, we decided to make the most of it and venture out onto Long Island.

name: Ocean Villa Inn
reviews.summary: It is not a luxury hotel but very nice for a close to the beach and reasonably priced hotel. We will definitely be coming back here to stay again

name: Oceanfront Inn
reviews.summary: The mattresses are a little to firm and pillows are a to soft. Loved the private balcony and the view.

name: Ocotillo Lodge

reviews.summary: We stayed a Friday to Monday and was a little put off by the Club music coming from the bar attached to the lobby but overall it was a nice stay. but I found it odd they had a lifeguard on duty for such a small pool but he was cool and pretty much stayed to himself the whole time.

name: Ramada Bordentown
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The staff was pleasant and professional the Manager Terrie Cowen, she went above and beyond and if it were not for her this whole party could have been a disaster. All I can say is if you want a clean hotel, quality service and a professional staff look no further then...

reviews.summary: The room was very clean and comfortable and they have a great deal from Papa John's which came in very handy since we were exhausted from a long trip and didn't want to go out for dinner.  The manager and the other people who worked at Ramada Flagstaff were very nice and helpful.

name: Ramada Frisco
reviews.summary: Room was smaller than I expected but it was nice. Everything was clean and nice.

name: Ramada Limited - Port Allen

reviews.summary: In case Subway and business centers dont pique your interest (I cant imagine), below are a few bullet points to consider: Pros:Friendly, professional staffNice view from eighth floor (out of ten)Room clean on entryExtended stay appliancesComfortable office chairDecent locationSubway across the streetFull complimentary access to 24-Hour Fitness ( also across the street)Free shuttleComplimentary continental breakfastFree Internet/printerQuieter, on-site fitness centerCons:Limited shuttle hoursVery firm bedOdd placement of televisionThin fold out bed with springy mattressPepsi-only propertyOpen, unencrypted wifiBusiness center machines potential for ID/financial theftRoom never cleaned throughout stayDear Ryan C,Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to complete a review of our property. The possibilities are truly endless, and I would be remiss if I didnt urge you to get your digital house in order before connecting to this network (or any others like it).We can start with a basic question, something along the lines of What does the business center offer Well, there are two desktop computers and a printer, so you could check-in for your flight or print your boarding pass.

reviews.summary: When I returned, there were two squad cars and police at the room above me, sidestepping the dog feces in the parking lot, I got into my room took a hot shower, took note of the cigarette burns in the bathroom of the non-smoking room, and hit the clean sheets. At least this time, the wifi eventually worked, but the desk clerk didn't even know that the room I was given didn't have a microwave / working refrigerator like my reservation said it would.

name: Super 8 Columbia
reviews.summary: Water wouldn't stay in sink and toilet ran all the time. Had to cut off water at night to be able to sleep,

name: Super 8 Crawfordsville
reviews.summary: Clean and OK to stay for a single night when you want a cheap hotel to come in late and stay overnight and get up early and leave.  After reading terrible reviews, dated a year ago, I was pleasantly surprised that renovations at this motel were complete.

name: Super 8 Delavan Near Lake Geneva
reviews.summary: We just needed a place to stay for one night and we thought we would give this place a chance after hearing it was recently remodeled. The smell when you walked in the halls was horrible and dirty smelling.

reviews.summary: The best part it the amazing view from our cabin: Coffee on front porch watching the sun come up to cocktails watching the sunset. The fishing and weather has not been the greatest but this resort is.

reviews.summary: Great rooms, excellent service, and a sweet breakfast with a make omelettes to order chef! Colleen is the bomb, and will give you wonderful personal service!

name: The Annex at The Chelsea
reviews.summary: There was also no mention of the beach chairs, umbrellas and towels, which I knew we had from the LivingSocial deal that brought us there to begin with only after asking the Concierge and going to the beach at 5 p.m., did we realize the service was only available until 6 p.m. When we asked for more shampoo and conditioner at the front desk, housekeeping ended up delivering three more sets of toiletries, which was a nice surprise, though they were haphazardly thrown onto the counter in our bathroom (the sink of which was peeling off).

name: The Armstrong Hotel
reviews.summary: This hotel is really charming, clean and it is a great location in Fort Collins. Great business location in heart of old town dining entertainment district.

name: The Armstrong Hotel
reviews.summary: It would be great for a longer stay since it's basically a one bedroom appartment with a full kitchen, 4 seat dining table and separate living room.  The Armstrong is a hotel with a lot of character, perfectly situated in Ft. Collins to allow easy access to the dining and shopping areas of town.

name: The Baroness Hotel
categories: Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Extended Stay,  Lodging
reviews.summary: The only problem I had with the room was the refrigerator was leaking on the floor, which made the room smell odd on the second day, and carpet wet. Second was the price was the best for the location to the near the convention center.

name: The Bay Motel
reviews.summary: however if you are in a smoking room dont open your windows they assume you have the heat on all the time and bug you about it like crazy. just look past the olive green and enjoy the massive water pressure in the shower ( really it sounds and feels like a water fall !

name: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel
reviews.summary: There's some construction going on at the property next door to be aware of, but it's New York and good luck finding somewhere without construction. The music in the gym, however, was too loud and we called to have it turned down and the staff couldn't figure out how to do it.

name: The Bellevue Hotel
reviews.summary: The location of the hotel is excellent 5-10 minutes walking distance from the Walnut Street entrance: Rittenhouse Square to the left, the Historical District to the right, the Theater District just down Broad street and the Convention Center up the street. Conversely, the rooms were remodeled in a contemporary, stark style reminiscent of hotels like W. They style in one area says one thing, and then a sudden CONTRAST that was not good.

name: The Benson Hotel
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The Benson is beautiful, with a classic grand lobby with elegant seating, high ceilings, a delightful place to pause. It serves fine breakfast, and a menu that works well through lunch and dinner, at very reasonable prices.

name: The Benson Hotel
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Northwest,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We would definitely go back the next time we are in Portland  We loved staying at The Benson. We had a family wedding here and the staff was friendly and so helpful.

name: The Bertram Inn & Conference Center
reviews.summary: The rooms were fine, but the meetings were not the best and the food at the restaurant was very slow and closed early. We hosted corporate meetings here for 15-20 people for about a week and in short, i will never go back again.

name: The Blennerhassett Hotel
reviews.summary: It was the perfect size for 30-50 people and it was nice and cool and the lights were very charming. We have family in the area, but prefer to stay at the Blennerhassett for everyone's convenience.

name: The Boxer
reviews.summary: I also think that although the space inside the rooms seems to be well used that there are some practical challenges with storage where existing space could be better used for the ease and comfort of guests. My husband tried it and thought the food was great but if there'd been a deal or something to catch our attention I'm sure we'd have eaten breakfast there both mornings of our stay.

name: The Brookshire Suites Inner Harbor, BW Premier Collection
categories: Business Hotel,  Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Highly recommend using their Valet service, the guys were very helpful and accommodating...they even let us keep our car there after we checked out and locked our luggage in the storage room at no extra charge! The beds were soft and super comfy, room was clean and relatively quiet from downtown noise, showers were hot with good pressure and breakfast the next day was decent.

name: The Broome
reviews.summary: This might be an odd point, but many of the luxury hotels I have been in lately have moved away from using a fitted sheet on the bed, which leaves the guest with a flat sheet on the bottom that twists and bunches by the morning. The Broome doesnt feel like NYC at allIt captures the elegance of Morocco and you feel a world away from the traffic and bustle of the city.

name: The Bryant Park Hotel
reviews.summary: Once again, a room with a great view...MoreHappy Anniversary and thank you for spending it with us. Would definitely stay...MoreThank you for giving us 5 stars and for all your wonderful praises.

name: The Bunkhouse Inn
reviews.summary: For a very old hotel with two spotless share bathrooms at a very reasonable price, this place... Maybe 300 people, 3 bars, and one gas station and a spectacular view of the Rocky Mountains!

name: The Bunkhouse Lodge
reviews.summary: We stayed in the Aztec Suite and it was cozy and quiet, If you are looking for modern settings this is not for you. The room was clean and the price was very affordable.

name: The Cabins At Pinehaven
categories: Lodging,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel,  Hotel & Motel
reviews.summary: We were very impressed with the sleeping arrangements and how large the cabin is, we will be back. The cabin was very clean and well stocked with dishes, towels, blankets and pillows.

name: The Capri Hotel
categories: Massage Studio,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel,  Spa
reviews.summary: It was clean, casual, excellent mattress, friendly and helpful staff, good location, pet friendly, fenced patio for the dog. THe management was really nice and moved us from the second floor to a handicapped room...also checked us in 1/2 hour early.

name: The Captain's Manor Inn
reviews.summary: Everything was perfect - appearance and condition of the property, the quality of amenities in our room, the delicious breakfast and afternoon treats, and of course the... More There are so many places to choose from on Cape Cod, but we are so very happy that we chose The Captain's Manor Inn.

name: The Carlyle, A Rosewood Hotel

reviews.summary: If you would like to further discuss your visit, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Hotel Manager, Massimiliano Puglisi, directly at Massimiliano.PuglisiRosewoodhotels.com. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

name: The Carneros Inn
reviews.summary: Thee was a wedding there when we visited and they dominated the Hilltop Pool (and they were very LOUD) Not a great place to visit with little ones, but for a couples retreat it is fantastic.

name: The Cartwright Hotel - Union Square, BW Premier Collection
reviews.summary: Staff was good except this one lady (I may go to extent of calling her border line racist), the reason: we were travelling to Lake Tahoe and asked hotel staff that can we leave our extra luggage at our check out and pick it up once we are back, we were told yes we can but on the day we were leaving she told us they will not, we told her that you guys said you can ... It was a very bad experience and significantly delayed our travel to Lake Tahoe while trying to figure out what to do with extra luggage.

name: The Cedars Motel
reviews.summary: Tim Kathy were a great help with explaining the area attractions and how to get there, and any construction that may delay you. It is a CLEAN motel to rest your head at the end of a day of sightseeing.

name: The Chalet Motel Of Mequon
reviews.summary: Very clean, great price and pleasant and professional staff. Two great restaurants within walking distance is nice too.

name: The Charles Hotel
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Weekend Getaway Hotel,  Travel,  Boutique Hotel,  Banquet facilities,  Banquet Rooms,  Breakfast & Brunch,  Tourist Hotel,  Luxury Hotel,  Restaurant,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Hotel Harvard Square,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The room had some very nice touches Bose wave radio, the ability to open the window a bit, nice views, marble bathroom with a TV built into the mirror, good selection of snacks and drinks for purchase. The location is great - close to Harvard, shops, restaurants, the T, the river, etc.

name: The Charlesmark Hotel
reviews.summary: Close to the T, the airport shuttle, historic churches, Public Library (also an attraction in itself), Prudential SkyDeck, the amazing Newbury St. with all the shops and restaurants... Also, I arrived very early in the morning and left in the middle of night, both felt okay to be out in the street, which is something I value the most.

name: The Chateau Motel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Resorts,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: As a child, my family beach vacations were always at the Chateau, so I love going back anytime I am in Panama City Beach. There are two staircases to get to the beach and with physical limitations it became challenging to get there.

name: The Chocolate Turtle Bed & Breakfast
categories: Bed and Breakfast,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Breakfast was hot and delicious there is an ice machine, complementary sodas, snacks and fresh baked cookies in the evening. More New owners Keith and Denise have done a great job continuing the high level of hospitality and excellence.

name: The College Club of Boston
reviews.summary: The rooms are decked out with lovely antique furniture, enormous marble bathrooms and delicious cookies and a continental breakfast included (also they have a coffee machine that makes reasonable strong coffee that's good to get you going in the morning). Walking from one end to the other, near the public gardens end is all up-market designer stores, but keep walking and you go past the usual round of high street stores before hitting the funky end a bit further on.

name: The Colonial Hotel
reviews.summary: The staff is very friendly and helpful and makes repeat guests feel like they are coming home. This hotel has great dinner and breakfast package highly appreciated throughout the region.

name: The Cornstalk Hotel
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We always admired the cornstalk fence in front of this hotel and decided to give it a try. We had been staying in a BB but it changed hands and was no longer up to our standards.

name: The Cub Motel
reviews.summary: I came to this lovely motel from New York and had requested a bonfire and the manager had set it up very beautifully for my family and I. This bonfire had given us the opportunity to spend quality time with my loved ones.

name: The Dana On Mission Bay, BW Premier Collection
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Resort,  American Restaurant,  Hotel Bar,  Harbor / Marina,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Our family loves The Dana this was out 5th time staying there. very friendly staff, beautiful resort.

name: The Dunes On The Waterfront
