reviews.summary: This is a rare gem of a place, with gorgeous grounds and views, lovely, well-equipped cottages and a friendly and attentive staff. Our family has now been coming to The Dunes on the Waterfront annually for close to a decade now and we are never disappointed.

name: The Eastland Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: When I called for a reservation Anne told me she would put us in the Galveston room overlooking Lamar St. but when we got there she put us in the Cisco instead because someone was in the room next to the one we'd been told... night at this hotel after eating lunch at Mary's Caf in Strawn.

name: The Eleven Inn
reviews.summary: More  Rustic looking motel with out west accents outside the rooms and in the courtyard. Getting to watch our kids play on a vintage metal merry-go-round has been so cool....

name: The Eleven Inn
reviews.summary: As soon as arrived i got a big friendly welcome this family own hotel is very comfortable fresh coffee all day free wifi and cable pet friendly safe parking and bomb fire for kids at night we even got early check in with no problem we had a sitting area outside with table and room 1 was big comfortable mini... It is owned by a lovely couple who multitask between greeting and checking in guests and working very hard in keeping the place looking good.

name: The Fargo Inn Suites
categories: Casino,  Bars,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel Village West,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The first room we got instantly smelled like smoke so we told the front desk and they got us a new room - which was very nice of them. I slept in a hooded sweatshirt because I didn't feel comfortable in the bed.

name: The Flagstone Motel
reviews.summary: On foot, you can hit the Discovery Trail, walk to great restaurants or grocery stores, or checkout what's going on downtown. This was our second stay at the Flagstone.

name: The Francisco Bay Inn
reviews.summary: Not being familiar with the lay of the land we took the info provided of others indicating it was only a 15 minute walk to the pier 39 and also used this in our decision to stay here. There are some wonderful restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood as well no more than a 10 minute walk in the direction of the Presidio on Chestnut.

name: The Gables Inn Sausalito
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: There was an ample amount available for breakfast, and the wine and cheese nights were very relaxing and fun to attend. We met wonderful people staying at the inn with us... made the atmosphere very friendly and homey.

name: The Grand Highland Hotel
reviews.summary: Plenty of dining and night life in the immediate area and some rooms have an amazing view of the square. But definitely would recommend this hotel to my friends and would come back for another stay .

name: The Grand Highland Hotel
reviews.summary: But definitely would recommend this hotel to my friends and would come back for another stay . Room was small but very pleasant and comfortable Stairs to get up to the lobby were steep .

name: The Green Tree Inn
categories: Travel & Transport,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel,  Bed & Breakfasts
reviews.summary: There is always plenty to eat at breakfast (someone at our table had three servings of Connie's pumpkin pancakes--and it wasn't me!) The inn keeper gave us coupons for wine at the Grafton Winery and Restaurant where we enjoyed the sunset over the Mississippi.

name: The Harkness Hotel
reviews.summary: We each booked a unique room, and had a potluck in one with a kitchen. The renovations are absolutely beautiful, inspiring and well done.

name: The Herbert Hotel
reviews.summary: Breakfast wasn't included, but who needs that if there are a hundred places nearby to eat every hour of the day. Astonishing with this hotel was the old building left in the middle of shopping centers, high buildings.

name: The Herrick Lodge
categories: Lodging,  Motel,  Resorts,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Corporate Lodging,  Union Dale,  Union Dale Hotel,  Pennsylvania (pa),  Restaurant,  Hotel
reviews.summary: My spouse has eaten here a couple of times in the past, mostly very good experiences, but the last time (a month ago) was very poor. Consequently, we decided to give it another try to see if the last visit visit was an aberration.

name: The Hideout Lodge Guest Ranch
reviews.summary: From the moment we (I and 7 outstanding horsewomen) arrived on Sunday, Sept. 13th, we were impressed and continuously amazed with the outstanding service, friendly folks, beautiful landscapes..... the food was delicious.....buffalo sirloin, elk, breakfasts of our dreams.....

name: The Historic Elk Mountain Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: You get the best of both world's with being able to hike in the Snowy Mountain Range, where you can go for miles without seeing a soul, and ending up in the Elk Mountain Hotel with a fabulous Sidecar and Steak. The rooms were clean and very comfortable and the added touch of the rubber duck on the tub was a whimsical addition.

name: The Historic Jefferson Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: But..when you go here..look..oak a escape route..lol..necromancer.. so Prepare The restaurant bus awesome..

name: The Hotel of South Beach
reviews.summary: Good: It might sound strange to say that I was ill in bed for most of my stay but still gave the hotel top ratings!. Good: If you are looking to be at the centre of all the South Beach madness then this is the perfect hotel.

name: The House on Old Mill Road
reviews.summary: Great view of the town of Creede and an easy half mile walk to historic downtown area. We had helpful communication with the owner before, during and after our stay.

name: The INN at Europa Village
reviews.summary: My husband and I celebrated our 1st anniversary and stayed at The Inn at Europa. Our room was very clean and comfortable and the staff was very professional.

name: The Inn At Crested Butte
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Bed & Breakfast & Inns,  Hotel
reviews.summary: My sister and I arrived late in the day so the hotel tried to connect with us via phone and email in advance of our arrival to confirm and ensure we had an easy arrival, even though we were arriving after the front desk was closed for the day. The Inn at Crested Butte is two blocks off the main drag and in a perfect location to be quiet but close enough to everything.

name: The Inn At Virginia Mason
reviews.summary: We hope your trip was successful and look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you again in the future - our prices will always be the best in the city! Because of that we got a good price and felt that we had saved 75-100 a night instead of being closer to the downtown area of Seattle.

name: The Inn At Virginia Tech And Skelton Conference Center
categories: Restaurants,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel,  American restaurants
reviews.summary: Unless you're featured on the Lives of the Rich and Famous, this hotel has every comfort and amenity you need or want.   Surrounding was also very cool and Calm and is good for nice walk in the morning and evening.

name: The Inn at Solvang
categories: Bed Breakfasts,  Hotel & Motel,  Bed Breakfast,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Everything was sold out in State College for Garth's concerts and the Inn came up as available...what an amazing find!! The Inn is wonderfully decorated and I so enjoyed browsing all the books.

name: The James New York  NoMad
reviews.summary: While I know there has been some challenges with renovations, I wish people would not get hung... I have stayed at the hotel several times over many years (while it was The Carlton).

name: The Joy Motel
reviews.summary: So if you are looking for an investment property and a challenge this property would fit the bill. Good luck to the current owners and the new owners.

name: The Kahala Hotel & Resort
categories: Business Hotel,  Spas,  Lodging,  Resorts,  Resort,  Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Spa,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Attractions
reviews.summary: Mahalo for staying at The Kahala, we are delighted you enjoyed your stay and the peaceful beach. My family and I really enjoyed staying at The Kahala.

name: The L.A. Hotel Downtown
reviews.summary: So happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations in every way during your stay. Donna at the front desk was super helpful and suggested many nearby restaurants.

name: The Lexington Hotel, Autograph Collection
reviews.summary: Sadly, when you are only there a weekend, you do not need laundry, so that is a bit of a waste and un-needed. This is a great location, easy walk to Grand Central, 5th Avenue, Rockefeller Cemtre, Trump Tower, Times Sq.

name: The Lodge At Lolo Hot Springs
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Resorts,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The dcor was everything wed hoped for, log cabin style walls/ceiling and we were also told that all the log furniture was made in Montana.... We stayed in a family room and it was the perfect size for the four of us, equipped with a microwave and refrigerator too.

name: The Lodge At Russell
reviews.summary: Upon checking in we spent the next 15 minutes chasing and squishing black bugs around the floor. While nice looking on the outside and in the lobby the rooms leave much to be desired!

name: The Lodge Hotel
reviews.summary: Within walking distance of club house, did not eat at club house, but others in our party did and said food was good. Roads are in need of repair, so if you're on a motorcycle watch out for pot holes.

name: The Lodge at Pebble Beach
reviews.summary: If you know you are going i would recommend making a reservation for a meal otherwise be prepared to wait (especially if it is a nice day). More  Having a drink or a meal at the lodge is the best way to take in the view of the ocean and the 18th hole.

name: The London West Hollywood
reviews.summary: The pool deck has an amazing view of Weho and is amazing people watching, all the hip and glamour people are here!   The breakfast is delicious with lots of healthy options and the room service is good, fast and 24 hours.

name: The London West Hollywood
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Resorts,  Boutique Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: It was our first stay at The London, and I am positive we will be going back the next time we find ourselves on the west coast. This was such a great experience I added two days on the end of a business trip in order to enjoy the pool and relax.

name: The London West Hollywood at Beverly Hills
reviews.summary: Downstairs in the restaurant, the view is nothing special, but the mini pizzas are good and not too expensive, given the setting. If you have out of town guests, demand they stay here so you can eat on the roof!

name: The Maritime Hotel
reviews.summary: We cabbed it to Broadway for dinner and a show, but also did lots of walking - including up to the Natural History Museum. Nice bathroom, aside from some trouble in turning on the cold water for the sink (handle was difficult to turn).

name: The Mercantile Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The suite was updated with modern design had two TVs a living room with mini fridge, microwave, and keuring. I stayed there for one night with a group of five friends including me to celebrate my friends birthday.

name: The Mills House Wyndham Grand Hotel
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Resorts,  Weekend Getaway Hotel,  Beach Hotel,  Luxury Hotel,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The hotel itself is elegant and cozy, with a great bar and restaurant, nice outdoor courtyard, great pool and outdoor patio area, and small but nice rooms. The valet parking is expensive (~$29 a day) which is a pet peeve of mine - I think the parking should always be included.

name: The Modern Hotel and Bar
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Bar,  Bars Clubs,  Restaurants,  Hotel Bar,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We had pre wedding photos taken in the lobby, bar and outside and everyone was happy to be helpful in any way possible. Although we did not dine there, the food looked excellent as well.

name: The Monarch Hotel
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel,  Budget Hotel
reviews.summary: I rarely write reviews but after reading some of the scathing reviews, and wanting to cancel my own reservation after reading them (but had booked a nonrefundable reservation), I wanted to make sure this sweet little hotel receives the credit it deserves. Here are some tips/info you should know: It is right across the street from a facility where the homeless get services they are always hanging out there.

name: The Monte Vista Hotel
reviews.summary: Monte Vista is a charming old hotel with a great caring staff, good bar and even better restaurant. Owners are on site and took time to make sure we got whatever we needed, even down to bring... More

name: The Mountain Inn
reviews.summary: Heated pool outside - nice adventure :) Recommended  The hotel is crazy outdated with comforters literally dating back to the 1960's (and haven't been washed since). The first room that we checked into had spots of blood on the shower curtain, one wall, and ceiling fan, and a pubic hair perfectly placed on the bathroom towels.

name: The Nest Palo Alto
reviews.summary: We are honored you chose our hotel and thrilled we were able to offer you our premium accommodations. I will defiantly come back on my next business trips to the area.

name: The Niantic Inn
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Motel,  B&bs / Inns,  Bed & Breakfast & Inns,  Hotel
reviews.summary: While our overall 2 night stay was not unpleasant and the location is excellent if you wish to be in town, there were a few things that would have made our stay much more relaxing while we were there. Our room was on the 3rd floor and there is no elevator which for us was not too big a deal...

name: The Nolitan Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel,  Hotel & Motel mgmt.
reviews.summary: The location is by far the best in terms of distance from subway, best stores (Ayr, KOIO, Outdoor Voices, DryBar) Restaurants (Mikakus Sushi, SweetGreens and Jacks Wife Freda)4. The rooms are clean, new and made by the best materials and in the exact size, you need for a short stay in the city.

name: The Norwood Inn
reviews.summary: Kitchennet is really nice , comfortable beds and nice bathroom, quiet and comfortable.a great price for a great stay I am extremely picky about cleanliness and beds and linens in hotels and I can say that this place has very high standards. Very convenient right in town, very friendly staff with a lot of info for the area!

name: The Oaks Hotel
categories: Alternative Fuels,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We enjoyed our dinner so much the first night we had dinner again at the hotel the second night. The room was spacious and well-appointed, the staff was friendly and the food was great.

name: The Ocean Lodge
reviews.summary: My wife and I recently stayed at The Ocean Lodge, we have traveled all over the world and Ocean Lodge ranks tied for first place in best places to stay only matched by Travaasa in Hana, Hawaii. We are sorry to read of the temperature issue in your room we would have been happy to address the issue and find a solution for you to enjoy your evening.

name: The Old No. 77 Hotel & Chandlery
reviews.summary: Compar Lapin was unbelievable and my children could not get enough of their homemade pasta and gnocchi and probably would have gone home with our server, Clare (that is how much they liked her). The room was so comfortable my children slept almost two hours past their norm, which was probably appreciated by the majority of guests who had been tearing up their livers the night before.

name: The Orchard Garden Hotel
categories: Business Hotel,  Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Venues Event Spaces,  Hotel,  Travel,  Luxury Hotel,  Budget Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Attractions,  Family-Friendly Hotel
reviews.summary: again!And we agree a clean hotel and location are vital to a great staySincerely,Bruce P.Front Office Manager  Gorgeous room, friendly and welcoming staff, immaculately clean, great value, and joyous attention to detail are just a few of the attributes that come to mind about the Orchard Garden Hotel. We all really enjoyed our stay at this hotel and in San Francisco in general, lots to see and do and the people are really friendly and welcoming where ever we went, and to cap it all off the Giants won the World Series and we were treated to a Homecoming Parade in their honour.....awesome.

name: The Parisian Courtyard Inn
reviews.summary: Kim provided outstanding breakfasts and made us feel right at home as she sat down and joined us in friendly conversation. Kim was friendly, engaging and very knowledgeable about places to go and things to see in NO.

name: The Park On Main Hotel
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Hotel & Motel mgmt.,  Hotel
reviews.summary: My family of four plus our best behaved child, Boston Terrier, stayed here on 6/20/16-6/22/16 and loved our stay. In fact, this hotel was the highlight of a week long driving trip through NC.

name: The Parkside Inn
reviews.summary: We didn't receive the balcony and almost canceled our reservation when we were told we had to pay extra for the balcony, despite having requested it (this is something that could have been made aware to... More We booked a room more than 6 months before our trip, at The Parkside Inn, requesting an upper level floor and room with balcony.

name: The Pearl Hotel
categories: Cocktail Bar,  Hotel & Motel,  Movie Theater,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Ive never felt the urge to write a review of a hotel before, but I really wanted to for this hotel as I was so pleased we found this little gem wanted to share our experience with others thinking of staying here. If we ever go back to San Diego, I will make sure we stay at this hotel if anyone who works at the hotel is reading this thank you very much for the fabulous service!Thank you very much for the detailed review.

name: The Pearl Hotel
reviews.summary: I had been told the day before, that it was possible that our room could be ready by 10:30 am, although check in was officially at 4pm. The male who checked us in heard me, and asked what kind of wine we liked, and said that he would send some up, on the house!

name: The Pecos Trail Inn
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Lodging,  Restaurants,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We were happy to be treated again with the same warm hospitality as our previous visits to the Pecos Trail Inn. Our family returned to Santa Fe this last week for a summer visit.

name: The Pines Lodge, A RockResort
reviews.summary: Well located outside the village but only a short walk (even shorter on the skiway) to the bridge and the village. We have been to Beaver Creek a few times over the years, but this was the first time we stayed at the Pines.

name: The Polynesian Resort
reviews.summary: You are within walking distance of the main business corridor and about a 1/4 mile from the beach. This place is always clean and inviting, has great accommodations and the staff is friendly.

name: The Pontchartrain Hotel
reviews.summary: Absolutely no complaints... More  Pontchartrain Hotel has friendly service and guest rooms that are beautifully appointed to the smallest detail to ensure luxury and comfort. Right outside the hotel is a stop for the streetcar so its in a great location too.

name: The Press Hotel, Autograph Collection
reviews.summary: From the hotel you can easily walk to the port where there are a great many excellent restaurants and numerous shops to wander through. Rooms nicely appointed, if a touch small (few drawers for clothes) big bathrooms.

name: The Redbury New York
reviews.summary: We stayed in a deluxe double, the beds are really small, view was bleh, and there was a lot of construction across the street so it was noisy on our side early in the morning (not the fault of the hotel obviously) We called to the front to ask for cutlery, they said they would check and see if they had any and bring it up twenty minutes later my husband had to go and get it.

name: The Resort at Longboat Key Club
reviews.summary: You made sure everything was taken care of the whole day and even gave us a few places to visit while we're here! The pool was super clean along with the rooms and we have so much fun so far:) we will definitely be returning :)

name: The Restoration
reviews.summary: Given the price of this hotel, I hold it to a higher standard than a Hampton Inn. And very nice condo/suite that was comfortable and nicely furnished.

name: The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Meeting Facilities,  Wedding Sites,  Luxury Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: - Draws are small in room- Only one luggage rack in our room- Relatively small rooms to other Ritz properties I've been to  Celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary, we were treated like royalty at the Ritz Carlton Central Park. Nice amount of pens, paper, soaps, and other useful items in room including currency power converter for international devices- Choice of AM newspapers- Extremely fair at checkout...

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Atlanta
categories: Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Luxury Hotel,  Wedding Sites
reviews.summary: I certainly appreciate your comments praising our staff, their service commitment and your positive impression of our fitness center. MoreDear Mike, thank you for posting such a great review and for sharing your wonderful experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Atlanta.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Boston
reviews.summary: We hope you will return for that upcoming business trip - getting to Cambridge from the hotel is a breeze - as well as many more occasions, when it will be our sincere pleasure to welcome you back. Dear mnmorange,So glad to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with your family at The Ritz-Carlton, Boston, with all of the city so easily accessible just outside our doors.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Dove Mountain
categories: Resort,  Pool,  Resort,   and Pool,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The food at all the restaurants was very good and the prices are what you expect to pay at a five star resort and not over inflated. We stayed here two nights and boy I wish it was more.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Pentagon City
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Meeting Facilities,  Wedding Sites,  Luxury Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The meeting halls for our conference were great, our room was wonderfully comfortable, clean, and well-furnished, and most importantly the hospitality and courtesy shown to us as guests tops that of any other hotel we've ever stayed at. Every single member of the staff that we encountered from the moment that we pulled our vehicle into the check in area on 7/4 until our trunk was packed on 7/7 was friendly, professional and helpful.

name: The Roosevelt Hotel
reviews.summary: Given that the lobby, restaurant and bar area were being completely remodeled, we found the staff to be very attentive and quick to provide solutions to our concern. Warmly, Abby  The Roosevelt staff is very friendly and ready with suggestions for tours and restaurants.

name: The Roosevelt New Orleans, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
reviews.summary: We are lucky to work in a historic property in its prime location, but know that without a consistent level of top notch service our guests would choose one of the many other options nearby. We take pride in giving excellent service for everyone who walks through our hotel, and are happy to hear that you loved your stay with us, as well as the helpfulness of the staff!

name: The Rose & Thistle Bed & Breakfast
reviews.summary: Patti was very welcoming as we arrived and spot on with the directions she gave us around town and further as well as in her recommendations. More For years we've been talking about a visit to Cooperstown and we were extremely pleased with our choice of the Rose Thistle.

name: The Roxbury Motel
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We've been coming here for years now and can never stop singing the praises of is hotel and the entire team behind The Roxbury. The decor was amazing and so unique - we just wish we could have had a tour of the other rooms!

name: The Saga Motor Hotel
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Right on Colorado Boulevard, across the street from Pasadena City College, the Saga can best be described as a 1950s motor lodge. That is, its a place you can sleep in relative comfort, but the decor is sadly in need of updating.

name: The Saint Hotel Key West, Autograph Collection
reviews.summary: We mistakenly left a bag of gifts at the hotel when we had already left for home and after calling the hotel to see if we had left it there, it was sent back to our home within five days! I chose this hotel the first time due to its location, but after staying noticed it could have used some updating however the location made up for that.

name: The San Remo Hotel
categories: Bed Breakfasts,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Nice quiet neighborhood, and the hotel guests are quiet for the most part- Lovely restaurant on the ground floor, also quiet (I never heard any noise from the restaurant while in our room).Cons:- Rooms are very small, I'd say our room was 8 x 8 ft, max. - Beds aren't that comfortable...not unbearably so, but ours had definitely seen many years of use so the mattress was caving in a little.- No A/C. There are ceiling fans though, which helps with the ventilation (it can get stuffy in those rooms). I would say if you are a younger traveller this may not be the hotel for you as we did get told off for laughing too loudly with some travellers from neighbouring rooms, however this was completely justified, just if you're after a more lively scene, pick a hotel with sound proofed rooms!

name: The Sea Lion Motel
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,  Travel and Tourism,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The only thing I can say wrong about the place is rooms do not have microwave or coffee pots, but they do have small items in the office. We had a room that looked out to the ocean at a distance.

name: The Sheeley House Bed Breakfast
reviews.summary: More We booked the entire Sheeley House for my daughter's wedding 9/26/15 and loved the house. The blueberry buttermilk pancakes were the lightest and finest I've ever had!

name: The Siena Hotel, Autograph Collection
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Budget Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Our room was beautifully furnished, bed very comfortable, bathroom nicely appointed and spacious.... You really don't need to leave this hotel between check-in and check-out, except of course we did.

name: The St. Regis Atlanta
reviews.summary: I've been traveling to Atlanta for work recently and it is uber convenient for me in a lovely neighborhood. The kitchen staff was so nice to store my wedding cake and cut it and put it in boxes for us!

name: The St. Regis New York
reviews.summary: Once inside the room, we were impressed with the modern update using the computer technology, among them: the TV screen fit right into the bathroom mirror would earn a wow factor the 4 types of lightening controls located both near the bed and the entrance of the room was a plus in convenience and lacquer-like Chinese cabinet under the TV to hind the refrigerator and bar was a combo of beauty and convenience. We will share your kind words with our teams and we are so grateful for your support!We hope that we will have the opportunity of having you as our guest very soon!Sincerely, Octavia MargineanHotel Manager  Our son made the arrangement for us to stay here for one night after a short staying in another SPG hotel.

name: The St. Regis San Francisco
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Wedding Sites,  Luxury Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Location is perfect, just South of Market, right next to the Museum of Modern Art, across the street from Yerba Buena, Metreon, and a short walk to all of the Union Square and Market Street shopping. Beautifully finished with high ceilings, big windows allowing for lots of natural light, plenty of space, huge shower, soaking tub, and amazing views over Yerba Buena.

name: The Star Inn
reviews.summary: We stayed at the Star Inn , comfortable, clean and a convenient location.   We were within walking distance to the town, shops, and restaurants.

name: The Stardust Motel
reviews.summary: It was a very nice getaway, quite, I enjoyed the opportunity to relax, I will go back again soon. Included breakfast which was a nice surprise, especially before a two day mountain bike race.

name: The Summit Of Gatlinburg
categories: Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Condominiums
reviews.summary: This was by far the best hotel I have stayed in major upgrade to what I am used to, and I was just loving every minute of it this past weekend. I have no complaints I actually cant wait to go back.

name: The Surfjack Hotel Swim Club
reviews.summary: The building wraps around a courtyard, and once you enter the premises you are sheltered from the busy city. This small hotel seems very hip and stylish, with plenty of attractive areas for lounging.

name: The Troubadour Hotel New Orleans, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
reviews.summary: We will certainly share the details with our management team to make sure housekeeping is doing a more thorough job while cleaning the rooms while also taking care with guest items. The acting manager, Toriano, the first shift front desk people were extremely friendly, patient, competent and professional and compensated for any mishaps we experienced.

name: The Varden Hotel
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel Downtown Long Beach,  Corporate Lodging,  Lodging,  Motel,  Bed & Breakfast & Inns,  Hotel
reviews.summary: More  I chose this place due to the trip advisor reviews and I can agree that it is a great little place. The best and most friendly, kind, caring, catering and professional service I have ever received.

name: The Villa Toscana
reviews.summary: The location was convenient, the room was comfortable, the innkeeper helpful and the overall experience excellent. I was a little nervous about staying at a bb in Wrigleyville Place was great, small but very clean .

name: The Virginian Suites, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member
reviews.summary: If your looking for a nice clean place close to everything at about half the price of the hotels downtown, you have to stay at the Virginian Suites. He was extremely courteous and helpful with all our requests, offered us advice on transportation and dining in the area which was great.

name: The Westin Atlanta Airport
reviews.summary: A perfect spot to catch a 6:00 AM shuttle to the airport...wake-up call was very efficient....we ate dinner in their restaurant and it was good, not great... Good day charn498, Thank you for providing your feedback from your recent visit to our hotel and Martini's lounge.

name: The Westin Chicago River North
reviews.summary: I've stayed here many times and if the price is right will continue, however if your looking to walk into a hotel and get wow factor, this one is not for you. Next time I plan on coming with my husband so he can experience this wonderful place!

name: The Westin Houston Memorial City
reviews.summary: Upon check-in the ladies at the front desk chatted with us a bit and later that evening delivered the sweetest package addressed to my daughter. My daughter calls this Westin the American Girl hotel because there is a sky bridge that takes you right to the store.

name: The Westin Las Vegas Hotel & Spa
reviews.summary: Check-in was easy, the staff was friendly and helpful, the size of the room was pretty standard (which is all I wanted or needed), the bathroom was clean and well-appointed, and the bed was comfortable. Good: The hotel was less than 1/2 mile to the strip (an easy 10 minute walk), which allowed me to be close enough to take advantage of it, but far enough removed to get away from the mega-ness of it.

name: The Westin Nanea Ocean Villas, Ka'anapali
reviews.summary: Thanks for the wonderful service that made our vacation memorable!Aloha Catherine A,Mahalo (thank you) for your review, recommendations, and sharing that your stay at The Westin Nanea Ocean Villas was the Best Vacation Ever! This resort is truly Hawaiian, intentionally designed to reflect the culture and history the lobby itself is remarkable with detail in the woodwork, fish baskets, circular posts representing the elements, and so much more.

name: The Westin Poinsett, Greenville
reviews.summary: The staff told my DOC they were not going to pack up the reception decor, which resulted in my DOC, father, and several groomsmen spending an hour or two packing up the items and then carrying them to my father's room. You are charged taxes, gratuity, and services fees for this hour though the contract states this is part of the package; this was an issue and I'm still not in agreement that it was right since it was never mentioned.

name: The Westin San Diego
reviews.summary: We are in an amazing location and offer great amenities that include a number of amenities such as: round trip airport transportation, internet, bottle water in all guestrooms, snack hour daily, local and domestic long distance phone calls, 24/7 Texting service, * Newly added 10 off Spa services, bike rental up to 4 hours, and ticket for the Midway. Our location is also one of the most favorable aspects of this hotel - we are nestled in between a few ideal neighborhoods allowing you easy access to the Gaslamp Quarter, Little Italy, the Harbor and Seaport Village.

name: The Westin San Diego Gaslamp Quarter
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Resorts,  Weekend Getaway Hotel,  Boutique Hotel,  Ski Resorts,  Luxury Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Conventions,  Hotel
reviews.summary: If I'm in the gas lamp area again I will definitely just go in and have a drink if Pebbles is working!!   It is noteworthy that there is a fee for internet, but the fee was waved for me.

name: The Westin San Jose
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Caterers,  Restaurants,  American restaurants,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Not only was this a beautiful property but the whole staff: the valet, front desk, sales, food and beverage, A/V Internet departments were so helpful. Even when I screwed something up, they helped me make it look seamless.

name: The Westin Washington Dulles Airport
reviews.summary: My best friend's brother and I went to the... More  Stayed at this hotel for one night and the rooms were nice, clean, but slightly small.  My best friend, her brother and I went to visit Washington D.C on September 2015 and this is where we stayed.

name: The Westport Inn
reviews.summary: We are in the process of moving, and are familiar with this property and have had no choice but to stay here when we are in town. All in all - it is a motel that has been refurbished, but the rear part is actually quite nice and the rooms are big and quiet.

name: The Whitney Hotel
reviews.summary: We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting your next stay at the Whitney Hotel!Sincerely, Casey A. CallaisGeneral Manager  The Hotel is within easy distance of both the French Quarter and the Warehouse district. This is a historic building built as a bank and office use, so rooms may be smaller than a normal hotel, but the building has character.

name: The Wilderness Inn
reviews.summary: We stayed at the Wilderness Inn for the past two nights while enjoying Wallowa Lake, Joseph, the fireworks and the entertainment in Joseph. We got a room with two queen beds which was clean, had great water pressure in the shower.

name: The Willcox
reviews.summary: I made a guaranteed reservation in October for the Masters golf tournament week, which is held every year in April. SIX MONTHS after I made my reservation, I received an email from the manager Tina McCarthy saying that...

reviews.summary: This hotel use to be known has the Best Western of Winnfield but has been bought out and completely redone. I have been very familiar with this little town since I do have family that lives here.

name: The Winnfield Lodge
reviews.summary: We had booked at this hotel 4 months in advance because TripAdvisor said this was the 1 hotel in Winnfield and honestly we did not even stay for 1 hour, we went to our room called La Jagu and moved to that hotel, please see my review of that hotel for information about it. When we arrived, the ladies at... More

name: Theater Motel
reviews.summary: Though not expensive, it is a higher end price especially for a motel and for that you would expect to have a very decent to excellent motel room. The reason I choose this motel was it was the least expensive motel in the area with a total cost with all taxes and fees of about 70.00 a night.

name: Thompson's Motel Inc
reviews.summary: I was overwhelmingly blessed with an amazing, genuine, and truly warm welcome and ready assistance. My experience was not as a motel guest it was as a stranded female biker in need.

name: Three Oaks Motel
categories: Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: never again returning and would advise anyone who was planning on choosing this place to not even waste their time because it would flat out ruin your trip. the rooms were terrible, and the service was simply awful.

name: Thunderbird Motel
categories: Hotel & Motel consultants,  Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: The room cleaner did a very poor job especially on the rugs which was in disrepair. Our room had 2 small queen size beds with a tiny bathroom.

name: Thunderbird Motel
reviews.summary: The place is not fancy, but the room was clean, decent sized and the beds were comfy. The room cleaner did a very poor job especially on the rugs which was in disrepair.

name: Timber Creek Chalets

More Staff was nice and the fruit available in the office was a nice touch.

name: Timber Creek Chalets
categories: Lodging,  Motel,  Resorts,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: It's very affordable (this is a relative measure since it's Estes Park). Staff was nice and the fruit available in the office was a nice touch.

name: Tmi Hospitality
reviews.summary: We arrived around midnight in a snowstorm and yet they made us feel like it was 2 in the afternoon. The front desk person working the night shift was especially warm and welcoming.

name: Toadlily House
reviews.summary: If you are exploring the Olympic Peninsula and need a nice warm bed and some companionship of other travelers, this hostel serves that purpose perfectly. more like a bed and breakfast than some lesser hostels, uncrowded and friendly, we enjoyed our stay at toadlily.

name: Tokeland Hotel
reviews.summary: The location, the history, the unique flora and fauna, funky cool building, great owners (Scott and Cathryn) are like your favorite aunt and uncle. The floors creak, the bathroom is down the hall, the doors stick....these are just more things we love about it!

name: Toledo Town Inn
reviews.summary: Toledo Town Inn is a good stay for fishermen on Toledo Bend. Large rooms with microwave mini- fridge.

name: Top Hat Motel
reviews.summary: Clean, whirlpool room with access to the internet and cable and a DVD/CD player and shuttle bus to... The owner and the women who helps keep the rooms clean Dorothy were truly accommodating.

name: Top's Motel

reviews.summary: A little on the high side compared to similar places we've stayed, but still reasonable. Expectation for a motel are naturally low, and this fits below average for a motel.

name: Wingate by Wyndham - Joliet
categories: Travel & Transport,  Business Hotel,  Lodging,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel & Motel,  Corporate Lodging,  Weekend Getaway Hotel,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We will definitely stay at this hotel next time we go to Chicago. But the room, the service and the breakfast are top quality.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Frisco
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Hotel
reviews.summary: We paid them to pick us up and they were a no show when we finally got someone on the phone the hung up on us. They advertise a shuttle service Frisco shuttle who are very unreliable.

name: Wingate by Wyndham LaGrange-Callaway
reviews.summary: However, it sounded like the guests above us were moving furniture around and doing some serious stomping until about 3 am. I initially liked the hardwood floors when we entered our room- definitely cleaner than carpeting.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Lake Charles Casino Area
categories: Gambling Casino,  Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Corporate Lodging,  Hotel
reviews.summary: First time staying at this hotel, found it to be what a travel would expect during a business trip. I was very pleased that my entire stay went off with out a problem.

name: Wingate by Wyndham San Marcos
reviews.summary: We also were not impressed with the powdered scrambled eggs in the breakfast buffet. I found a spider in the bed when I rolled back the sheets to go to bed.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Tuscaloosa
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Weekend Getaway Hotel,  Corporate Lodging,  Hotel,  Family-Friendly Hotel
reviews.summary: The staff was friendly, front desk gave us a list of local restaurants to try. The hotel was quiet and conveniently located.

name: Winterton Suites, Duchesne
reviews.summary: Felt like a small home away from home (which is what we were after). Kids loved their own room as opposed to a hotel suite, etc.

name: Wisconsin -Aire Motel
reviews.summary: My wife and I decided to try it because of the previous three reviews, they were new to Expedia and it was a great price for room. We like to get away on weekends a few times a month and on weekends when our inconsiderate neighbors play loud music.

name: Wood Spring Suites-orlando East
reviews.summary: Currently staying here and I must say have had no problems and everything is clean and staff is amazing , especially my buddy JOE....kudos to valueplace one more time you 've made me feel at home!!!!I have stayed before in another city and again you have WOWED me!!!We love to hear from repeat guests, especially when theyre happy with their stay. Great location, close to food, stores,etc. 15-20 minutes from Universaql When I left my key in the room, off hours assistance was outstanding, very quick response in getting door opened.

name: WoodSpring Suites Allentown
reviews.summary: Two down sides would be that since it is an extended stay hotel, housekeeping only comes once every two weeks. but I'm used to places where extended stay also means that short stays are what you'd expect at any hotel.

name: WoodSpring Suites Columbus Urbancrest
reviews.summary: Noise from hardwood floors needs work, though. I stayed for 22 days I'd stay longer.

name: WoodSpring Suites Jackson South
reviews.summary: I have stayed with Valueplace now Woodsprings in 3 different states and they are all practically the same accommodations and same level of service. Recently, they started allowing one night accommodations.

name: WoodSpring Suites Miami Southwest
reviews.summary: y aseo general cada 15, queda lejos de todo, no tiene piscina, creo que para una emergencia de ultima hora funcionaria bien porque no veo ningun servicio que valga la pena resaltar. Aunque el hotel en sus instalaciones esta completamente nuevo, el servicio de limpieza pasa solo cada 8 dias!

name: WoodSpring Suites Phoenix I-10 West
reviews.summary: When I walked in the the lobby to check in the manager and the general manager greeted me with kindness and it felt really good. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and we hope we get the privilege to serve you again soon.

name: WoodSpring Suites Virginia Beach
reviews.summary: Bad: The bed wasn't comfortable at all. Good: The room was very very clean.

name: Working Girls Hotel
reviews.summary: We spent one night here (in the suite) and wished we had the time to stay longer. Warning - the IPA at Prodigal Sons Brewing company sneaks up on you...

name: Worldmark Deer Harbor
reviews.summary: Only complaint was the one that my wife and I were in and it had a very squeaky floor (114). The harbor is a short two minute walk down a the pier and marina store....

name: Worldmark Estes Park
reviews.summary: We were less than a mile from the Rocky Mtn National Park and the scenery was breathtaking. The fireplace was terrific after a blustery snowy day, and the bed was super.

name: Worldmark New Braunfels
reviews.summary: We stayed here Feb 28 to Mar 6 in a 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath condo. I would rate the service alongside a Four Seasons property.

name: Wyndham Canterbury at San Francisco
reviews.summary: The rooms were nice and location was fantastic but its a shame the desk staff doesn't have a clue, I will not be returning to this chain and also will push my friends and family to avoid it as well. After waiting at the counter for over 20 minutes while the attendant the manager finally came over and gave us keys and assured it is fine the rate is the same and enjoy the stay.

name: Wyndham Garden Baronne Plaza New Orleans
reviews.summary: When we returned later that night we spoke to Ruby ( who was working at the front desk) about the incident and she advised us that we needed to talk to Candice Hudson, GM, who would be in the next morning betweem 9-10AM. When we had the opportunity to speak with Ms. Elysia Smith her immediate response: was since my husband was driving the vehicle then the hotel had no liability even though her empolyee directed my husband into the space.

name: Wyndham Garden Chinatown
reviews.summary: Would stay here again, so close to little Italy, and the subway!I'm glad you enjoyed the effort my team puts forth to make sure your stay with us is great! We had a wonderful stay at this hotel, the girl at the front desk at check in was wonderful!

name: Wyndham Garden Elk Grove Village/o'hare
reviews.summary: Unfortunately, the Wyndham Garden Elk Grove Village has been one of the worst examples of bad customer service I have ever encountered. I try to be fair and objective in my TripAdvisor reviews, because I take others' reviews seriously when booking a hotel.

name: Wyndham Garden Lafayette
reviews.summary: We booked at last minute, due to weather conditions, and arrived at 9:15 at night, It had been storming, so my 13 year old daughter and I opted to just order from... More Since I got a really good deal on Priceline, I was not going to right this review, but I just cant help myself as others need to know.

name: Wyndham Garden Lafayette
reviews.summary: The best part of all for me was the fact that they have real hair dryers in the room, not just one that blows barely above a whisper! The room was exceptionally spacious and comfortable, including a wet bar area and done in soothing colors of browns and teals.

name: Wyndham Garden Midland
reviews.summary: Our group comes in every year and we always appreciate the hospitality. Also, thanks for the group rate!

name: Wyndham Garden Pittsburgh Airport
reviews.summary: The shuttle driver told us that the hotel was recently under new management and a lot of items that were left by the former management is now getting done.  Other than being told on hotels.com that breakfast was included in our cost, but it wasn't, the stay was wonderful.

name: Wyndham Garden San Jose Silicon Valley
reviews.summary: I have to say that I was scare at first that my reservation was going to be denied, because there was many people with that problem before me. But when it was my turn, everything went well and actually because the hotel was full, they gave a better room for the same price.

name: Wyndham Garden Tallahassee Capitol
reviews.summary: It is a very clean hotel and I want to commend Catherine, who was in charge of my room, for keeping it so pleasant. Building and hallways and general room conditions not impressive.

name: Wyndham Garden-amarillo
categories: Hotel & Motel,   services,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Lodging,   chapels,   etc.,  Wedding supplies,   facilities,  Hotel
reviews.summary: room seemed OK at first, but curtains were not hung properly, (just dangling from rod) I had a large beetle in my bed, the chair in room was covered in red pen/marker, and seriously, there... elevator flooring was broken/peeling/popping up, and there was literally duct tape on walls holding parts together....

name: Wyndham Garden-dallas North
reviews.summary: Shuttle will take you anywhere within 7 miles so we did not ever use a cab or uber and got to many good restaurants as well as the beautiful Galleria mall, however, it does not go downtown. Whatever the hotel lacks in appearance is easily made up by the fantastic staff, Everyone from desk, to van drivers to restaurant personnel were wonderful and so accomodating.

name: Wyndham Houston - Medical Center Hotel and Suites
categories: Business Hotel,  Hotel & Motel,  Hotel & Motel reservations,  Resorts,  Weekend Getaway Hotel,  Lodging,  Clinics,  Beach Hotel,  Medical centers,  Physicians information bureaus,  Luxury Hotel,  Budget Hotel,  Hotel University Place,  Family-friendly Hotel,  Tourist Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: Hotel did a great job with shuttle service for KC Chiefs fan to playoff game in Houston. We had a very restful night and plan on staying again next month.

name: Wyndham Ka Eo Kai
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Resorts,  Resort,  Condominium Operators,  Hotel
reviews.summary: It is quiet and the staff is mostly very helpful, friendly and accommodating. For Wyndham owners, I'd expect you to rank it as average.

name: Wyndham Philadelphia-Historic District
reviews.summary: The room was a little on the small side and definitely could have been cleaner (like the bathroom and under the beds) but it was adequate and by no means did I feel like it was so dirty I wouldn't stay the night. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay and I would agree that we are in the perfect location to visit many of the historical sites in the area.

name: Wyndham Santa Monica At The Pier
reviews.summary: We understand that you have many choices, please keep us in mind in the future if your travels take you back to Santa Monica.   Dear michaelwW9944QS, I am very sorry to hear you will not continue to stay with us on your next visits to the area.

name: Wyndham Shearwater
reviews.summary: We changed islands part way through our trip and were disappointed we did. Our experience was very much overshadowed by our room it's location.

name: XV Beacon
reviews.summary: The location is perfect for exploring Boston and for anywhere a little further, a driving service is offered. The rate is expensive, but we enjoyed the high-level of service with multiple tidy services offered each day.

name: Yakutat Lodge
reviews.summary: Nothing fancy, but clean, well maintained rooms and cabins, good food, prompt service. The staff is amazing, and they make your feel welcome, in true Alaskan fashion.

name: Ye Olde Danish Inn
reviews.summary: Ferndale is a wonderful town with great shops and restaurants along with lovely heritage homes. Beautiful and peaceful property but within walking distance to town.

name: Z Bar Motel
categories: Lodging,  Hotel & Motel,  Motel,  Budget Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: My husband and I thought it was a most wonderful place to stay, especially the hospitality of both the front desk clerk and the two housekeepers we met who were so nice and accommodating in what we needed. Our room was most kempt than any of the other hotels we've been to in Wyoming and admired the cleanliness of it...

name: dana hotel and spa
reviews.summary: Excellent security staff -- Cheerfully and efficiently retrieved my forgotten keyboard, assured me it was safe, and FedExed it to me no charge. Desk staff are meh, but bartenders, concierge and gorgeous door men are all great, Super helpful and friendly

name: hampton inn Springfield southeast
reviews.summary: I travel often for business and I was absolutely blown away by the wonderful customer service I received at this particular location.  Excellent accommodations, excellent staff, super super breakfast in the morning, with everything you can imagine.

name: hotel le bleu
categories: Hotel & Motel,  Lodging,  Motel,  Resort,  Boutique Hotel,  Luxury Hotel,  Hotel
reviews.summary: They have friendly and knowledgable staff and overall it was the best experience I have had of a hotel. Room was very clean, comfortable beds, and very good continental breakfasts delivered to our rooms.
